title: Which song has better and meaningful lyrics, 'Dynamite' or 'Ice Cream'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both songs are good I am an army and I really liked dynamite and icecream too it has a great tune to listen to..plus blackpink members pronounciation was on point…Not to sound bad but definitely dynamite has meaningful lyrics they even made the song with the intention of making people enjoy during this pandemic…they wanted people to enjoy in this bad time..plus WHO too said thanked bts for coming with such an idea…i love them so much…no offense to blackpink or selena the song is really nice and i will definitely be jamming to it.
